item.title: Need help - how do i do this - still need help!1
item.dc:creator: @mresi5656 mresi5656
item.description:
@mresi5656 wrote:

hold on–i am attempting to give u my WHOLE client java to show you[br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2007, 04:54:07 PM[/size][hr]Ok Well I Can Only Show The Beggining Apparently: ;D
just erase everything i told u to put and paste this in the VERY begginning

         [code]/*

This Server Coded By Nick (Mresi)
Coded on TestScape source.
*/

import java.io.;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
import java.util.;
import java.text.*;

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
///////////top screen show info////////////////////////////////////
public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("@red@Nick@bla@Scape @red@By @bla@Nick", 6570);
sendFrame126("@red@Wild Level: @bla@"+WildyLevel, 6572);
sendFrame126("@red@Players Online: @bla@" + players, 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);
}
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////[/code]

thats what i have for mine

item.title: Need help - how do i do this - still need help!1
item.dc:creator: @mresi5656 mresi5656
item.description:
@mresi5656 wrote:

i cant find link but add this on very top of client.java (thats how mine is) put this where the coding starts; NOT THE CREDITS AND STUFF!!

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("You Server Name Here", 6570); sendFrame126("@red@Wild Level: @bla@"+WildyLevel, 6572); sendFrame126("@red@Players Online: @bla@" + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); }

You Can Also Make The Txt Colors; You Use The Color Names But Only The First 3 Letters Like - @red@ @bla@ (You have to use the “@” symbols to add colors.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2007, 04:37:03 PM[/size][hr]This Is How My Server Looks And I Also Gave You Code For Wild Lvl And Players Online.

Read full topic
